description: Step into this, like new, beautifully crafted heritage-style townhouse by Polygon, located in Coquitlam’s sought-after Burke Mountain. Offering 4 spacious bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and over 1,600 sqft of elegant living space with a highly functional layout. Enjoy a stunning open-concept kitchen with sleek cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, engineered stone countertops, full-height marble tile backsplash, and a generous island perfect for cooking or entertaining. The luxury master ensuite features a spa-inspired shower with built-in bench. Bonus: side-by-side washer/dryer, a lower-level bedroom with full bath, and a double side-by-side EV-ready garage. This is more than a home—it’s a lifestyle. Book your private tour today!
